content: वसनं [वस्-आधारे ल्युट्] {@--1@} Dwelling, residing, staying. {@--2@} A house, residence. {@--3@} Dressing, clothing, covering. {@--4@} A garment, cloth, dress, clothes; वसने परिधूसरे वसाना <ls>Ś. 7. 21</ls>; उत्संगे वा मलिनवसने सौम्य निक्षिप्य वीणां <ls>Me. 86</ls>, <ls n="Me.">41.</ls> {@--5@} An ornament worn (by women) round the loins, (probably for रसना).
